error.gateway_communication_error: Failed to communicate with the Enphase gateway.
error.gateway_authentication_error: Gateway authentication failed. Please verify that the credentials you provided are valid.
error.enlighten_communication_error: Failed to communicate with the Enphase cloud
error.enlighten_authentication_error: Enphase cloud authentication failed. Please verify that the credentials you provided are valid.
error.unknown: Unexpected error. See the logs for more details

user.description:
- For Firmware D7.x please enter your login credentials for the Enlighten website as username and password.
 - For older models, enter username `envoy` without a password or enter username `installer` without a password for even older models.
 - For all other models, enter a valid username and password.

data.use_lagacy_name: I have used another Enphase integration before and want to keep my historic data
